bill.summary:
21st Century American Service Act
This bill establishes the 21st Century National Service Program Implementing Taskforce, which shall develop a program to ensure that eligible individuals seeking to volunteer with a national service program shall have the opportunity do so. The bill also excludes national service educational awards from gross income for tax purposes.
